item.name: API Tokens
item.description: API Tokens - Create, read, delete access tokens used to interact with the IoT Central public APIs

item.name: Destinations
item.description: Manage destinations utilized to configure data exports within your IoT Central application

item.name: Devices
item.description: Get information about and manage devices and IoT Edge modules in your IoT Central application

item.name: Device Groups
item.description: List the set of device groups within your application

item.name: Exports
item.description: Manage data export definitions within your IoT Central application

item.name: File Upload
item.description: Update, retrieve and delete file upload configurations

item.name: Jobs
item.description: Get information about and manage jobs within your application

item.name: Organisations
item.description: Create, read, delete and list organizations within your IoT Central application

item.name: Query
item.description: Query for devices or device data from within your IoT Central application using IoT Central Query Language

item.name: Users
item.description: Add, update, and remove users within your application
